Package com.philips.platform.uid.thememanager

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ThemeConfig
    This is the interface which each dynamic configuration app needs to
    provide to be able to update the theme
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ThemeConfiguration  
    ThemeUtils  
    UIDHelper  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AccentRange
    This is the theme configuration which indicate which accent flavour your application should support
    ColorRange
    This is the configuration which indicates which color you app is running into this will be used as base to use coloring
    This will initialized the color levels used in the controls
    e.g if you use color range as GroupBlue then
    color level 5(uidColorLevel5) will be uid_group_blue_color_level_5
    Mapping is done as as below @color/uid_group_blue_level_5
    ContentColor
    This class will initialize the theme with some specific configuration as per specified tonal range
    NavigationColor  
    PrimaryControlType
